panels.visual: Marivielle giving Lunara a glowing seed
panels.dialogue: Marivielle: "Take this seed, dear. It's tied to the garden's magic. It may help restore balance if things go wrong." Lunara: "Thank you. We'll protect what the elves left behind."  ## CHAPTER 5: INTO THE COURIER TUNNELS
